Posts.Content: Jun 29, 2009 07:10AM - edited Jun 29, 2009 07:11AM by BYHISGRACE I have been using my older prosthsis  in my bathing suit for aquatic exercises.  It developed a small bubble leak.  I put a waterproof band-aid over it and it has outlived two bathing suits that were destroyed by the clorine in the pool.  They are not as fragile as we are told.  I do wash and dry it after each use.
Posts.Title: punctured prosthesis anyone? Mouser BYHISGRACE
